original: Hañci arahā pakaticitte ṭhito parinibbāyati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Hañci arahā vipākacitte ṭhito parinibbāyati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
nanu arahā vipākābyākate citte ṭhito parinibbāyatīti?
Hañci arahā vipākābyākate citte ṭhito parinibbāyati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Nanu bhagavā catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā parinibbutoti?
Hañci bhagavā catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā parinibbuto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
